name: nothing
description: There's an otherworldly nothing there - it somehow feels like a black wall at the front of your senses, yet you know what lies beyond it.

name: impossibly thin magenta line
description: You percieve a magenta line here.  It seems impossible thin - you're not even sure it has width in any meaningful sense.  You cannot tell where it is in relation to your height - confusingly, it seems to fill your entire field of vision.

name: impossibly thin cyan line
description: You percieve a cyan line here.  It seems impossible thin - you're not even sure it has width in any meaningful sense.  You cannot tell where it is in relation to your height - confusingly, it seems to fill your entire field of vision.

name: impossibly thin yellow line
description: You percieve a yellow line here.  It seems impossible thin - you're not even sure it has width in any meaningful sense.  You cannot tell where it is in relation to your height - confusingly, it seems to fill your entire field of vision.

name: impossibly flat blue square
description: You percieve a square, here.  It seems impossibly flat - you're not even sure it has depth in any meaningful sense.  You cannot tell where it is in relation to your height - confusingly, it seems to fill your entire field of vision.

name: white cube
description: A true cube of space where one could go left, right, up, down, backward, or forward - it reminds you of home.
